Entries.Dance_DC2: %Emily appears lost in her own world. Better not disturb her.
Entries.Dance_DC3: @! Hello! Do you want to join us? Just close your eyes and focus on the music.
Entries.Dance_DC4: Phew, I'm exhausted! That was a great workout.$1

Entries.Dance_DC1: Ah, good day to you, @! Care to join the dance?
Entries.Dance_DC2: ... with nary a backwards glance, Deana boarded... Oh, hello @! I 'twas congitating aloud, wasn't I?$1
Entries.Dance_DC3: @! Welcome. I am currently disentangling a particularly gnarly snarl of plot.$1
Entries.Dance_DC4: There is nothing quite like stepping into a book and being whisked away to another world, is there?
Entries.Dance_DC5: I feel as though I've journeyed far, deep into the depths of my imagination! Reality is but a pale shade in comparison, @.
Entries.Dance_DC6: Ah my body feels so limber, and my mind so clear and free! Emily really has the most marvellous ideas, doesn't she?

Entries.Dance_DC1: It's good to stretch my muscles. Sculpting is hard work, you know.$2
Entries.Dance_DC2: I thought it was nonsense, but now I'm one with the music - and inspiration is flowing!$1
Entries.Dance_DC3: Oh, hello @! Exercise is a great way to feel alive, don't you think?
Entries.Dance_DC4: So many ideas! I wish I could write faster.
Entries.Dance_DC5: Oh! My body aches, but it's a good ache, you know?
Entries.Dance_DC6: Just have to make a few quick sketches... I'll turn these into paintings later.$1

Entries.Dance_DC1: Dance like nobody's watching, right? Come on! It's fun.$1
Entries.Dance_DC2: Come on, shake your booty! Heh, I love this song!$1
Entries.Dance_DC3: This meditative dancing lark... it's oddly invigorating!

Entries.Dance_DC1: Do I ever feel silly dancing by myself? Nah, I'm just having more fun than everyone else!$10
Entries.Dance_DC2: Dancing is great exercise, and way more fun than a traditional workout!$h
